channel.title: GrantOtter — Federal Funding Updates
channel.description: Aggregated weekly feed of grant opportunities and agency news from NIH, NSF, and DARPA.

item.title: Notice of Change to Key Dates for RFA-NS-25-017 and RFA-NS-25-018: BRAIN Initiative Technologies for Recording and Modulation in the Nervous System.
item.description: Notice NOT-NS-26-005 from the NIH Guide for Grants and Contracts

item.title: NSF launches $100M National Quantum and Nanotechnology Research Infrastructure program
item.description: The U.S. National Science Foundation is investing up to $100 million to establish a nationwide network of open-access research facilities for quantum and nanoscale technologies, innovation, and workforce training. Through the new NSF National Quantum…

item.title: Transitioning NCAR-Wyoming Supercomputing Center operations
item.description: The U.S. National Science Foundation has informed the NSF National Center for Atmospheric Research (NCAR) that management and operations of the NCAR-Wyoming Supercomputing Center are expected to transition to a third-party operator consistent with…

item.title: Protean
item.description: This Research Announcement represents a solicitation for a research thrust, entitled Protean, that will focus on identifying novel ways to restore protein function to targets of chemical threat agents. | See Program

item.title: Planning an NIH Application involving Basic Experimental Studies with Humans (BESH)?
item.description: NIH announced that Basic Experimental Studies with Humans (BESH) will no longer be considered clinical trials by the NIH.

item.title: NSF announces first AI-ENGAGE awards to modernize global agriculture
item.description: The U.S. National Science Foundation, in coordination with partner agencies from Australia, India and Japan, today announced the first cohort of awards made under the Advancing Innovations for Empowering NextGen AGriculturE (AI-ENGAGE) initiative…

item.title: Notice of Extension of the Expiration Date for PAR-23-059 "National Cancer Institute Program Project Applications for the Years 2023, 2024, and 2025 (P01 Clinical Trial Optional)"
item.description: Notice NOT-CA-26-010 from the NIH Guide for Grants and Contracts

item.title: NIH Support for Early Stage Investigators in FYs 2024 and 2025
item.description: We are reporting on the number of early stage investigators (ESIs) supported on R01-equivalent awards in fiscal years (FYs) 2024 and 2025. ESIs are those who are within 10 years of their terminal degree or completion of clinical training and who have not yet been awarded a substantial NIH grant (R01-equivalent or more).

item.title: Notice of Change to Key Dates for PAR-23-209, PAR-23-204, PAR-23-201 NEI Collaborative Clinical Vision Research Grants (UG1 Clinical Trial Required)
item.description: Notice NOT-EY-26-001 from the NIH Guide for Grants and Contracts

item.title: Notice of NCI's Participation in PA-25-302, NIH Small Research Grant Program (Parent R03 Clinical Trial Not Allowed)
item.description: Notice NOT-CA-26-003 from the NIH Guide for Grants and Contracts

item.title: NIH No Longer Requires Advanced Permission for Conference Grant Applications
item.description: Notice NOT-OD-26-040 from the NIH Guide for Grants and Contracts
